message.body: Hi Julia! Hey, would it be ok for me to ride lucky today, I wasn't able to yesterday eve because of the storms :(
If not, it's totally cool, I will make it up another day! :)
Hey, I'm in Virginia til Sunday, so he's all yours til Monday! Thank you - how's he doing?
Oh!! :) ok! Great! :) I mean, I miss ya and all but lucky is golden! :) all good here.... :) have a good trip!!
Nice, thank you! See you Monday :)
